p: Statistically significant differences in the total polyphenol content (TPC) were observed in the extracts obtained from leaves harvested in June and July and dried naturally. In the June harvest, TPC was recorded at the level (11.6 ± 5.6 mg GAE/g DW) which was lower than the TPC value determined in the July harvest (14.9 ± 4.1 mg GAE/g DW).
